name: Frozen Tracks
description:
You are the yellow point on the planet, you can centre on this point by pressing the F key. Click on green nodes to start moving towards them, to hold your position press the H key, to hibernate the vehicle. When moving your motor heat will increase, if it passes 100°C your wheels will start to take damage, damaged wheels lower your speed.

Moving will earn you stored points, these will not count towards your score yet, to move points from your storage to your score enable the transmitter using the T key. No points will be transmitted in hibernate mode. Moving with the transmitter active will damage it, so will having it active in storms.

Not only will dust clouds and storms damage your equipment, they will also add dirt to your solar panels, which will reduce power production. In hibernation mode your vehicle will use less power, and will keep the thermal sensor safe at night. If you run out of power you will be stuck, and your score is finalised. Also not, that amount of sun available, it will affect your power production.

The camera can be used by pressing C, it will gather a large number of points, but will use a lot of electricity. The thermal sensors can be toggled with S, they will gather points over time, but will also use extra electricity over time. The thermal sensor will automatically disable if the vehicle is moved. 

Hope you have fun playing this game C:
sorry for the lack of quality UI
